name: steps
label: Eligibility Steps
help_text: Add each eligibility check step. Steps will be shown one at a time with navigation.

default.card_description: Please note that this is a patient-funded program, with costs starting at $16,500 USD (excluding travel and accommodation).

default.step_description: Eligibility to access our GMP-certified stem cells.

name: enable_meeting_booker
label: Enable HubSpot Meeting Booker
help_text: Enable this to embed HubSpot meeting booker after eligibility steps

name: meeting_booker_url
label: HubSpot Meeting Link
help_text: Paste ONLY the meeting URL here (e.g., https://meetings-eu1.hubspot.com/your-name). Do NOT paste the entire embed code - just the URL.

name: meeting_booker_title
label: Meeting Booker Step Title
help_text: Title shown above the meeting booker

name: meeting_booker_description
label: Meeting Booker Description
help_text: Description text shown above the meeting booker
default: Select a convenient time for your consultation with our team.

name: final_step_url
label: Final Step URL (Optional)
help_text: If meeting booker is disabled, redirect to this URL after last step. Otherwise, this is ignored.

name: gtm_event_prefix
label: GTM Event Prefix
help_text: Prefix for Google Tag Manager events (e.g., 'eligibility_step'). Events will be named like 'eligibility_step_1_confirmed'
